html:
We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products—learn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission.

The Business Growth & Brand Building Blueprint is your step-by-step framework to master branding & build a profitable business, without guessing what to do next.

Feeling overwhelmed? Unclear what to focus on next? Wondering what the next level looks like?

You’re not alone. But here’s the truth:

  • You don’t have a motivation problem.
  • You don’t need more hacks or hustle.
  • You need a better map. A blueprint.

The Business Growth & Brand Building Blueprint

It’s a clear, strategic framework to help you grow from early-stage creative to confident brand consultant and business owner.

Instead of winging it, guessing what to do next, or constantly reacting…

This gives you structure. Focus. Momentum.

You’ll know exactly where you are and what to work on next.

Most creatives think they have a “client problem.”

But what they really have is a clarity problem.

When you focus your skills, position yourself properly, and take the right steps in the right order…

Clients start taking care of themselves.

That’s what this Blueprint is here to do.

What You’ll Gain

A clear, proven framework to become a profitable brand builder with more clarity, control, and confidence.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Work with aligned clients
  • Charge what you’re worth
  • Focus on the work that fuels you
  • Build a business that works for you, not the other way around

What’s Inside

Two powerful growth tracks:

A) Mastering Branding Track

Build strategic confidence and become a trusted brand advisor

B) Building a Thriving Creative Business Track

Build systems, pricing, and positioning to grow sustainably and profitably

Each track is broken into 4 practical levels:

  • Level 0: Hustler (Foundations) – Get set up with the essentials
  • Level 1: Builder (Beginner → Intermediate) – Attract aligned clients and deliver value
  • Level 2: Strategist / Founder (Intermediate → Advanced) – Grow income and authority
  • Level 3: Consultant / Leader (Advanced → Mastery) – Scale impact and lead with confidence

Each level includes check-offable milestones that show you exactly where you are and what to focus on next.

How to Use It

Use the Blueprint to build the business and brand you want, step-by-step.

1. Download / Access the Blueprint

Enter your name and email. Includes Google Sheet, Notion Doc, PDF and BluePrint BOT.

2. Watch Video & Explore the Two Tracks

A) Mastering Branding – Become a confident strategist and advisor

B) Thriving Creative Business – Build a business that supports your freedom and financial goals

Watch the explainer video here:

3. Work Through the Levels

  • Browse each level and category

  • Tick off what you’ve already achieved

  • Focus on progressing through each level at your pace

Remember… This is a journey. Not a race.

4. Review Progress Quarterly

  • Revisit this blueprint every 90 days

  • Use it to reflect, refocus, and realign with your goals

  • Identify gaps to work on and celebrate your wins

 5. Use it With Your Coach or Pod

  • Share your tracker during coaching calls or pod check-ins

  • Let it guide goal-setting and accountability

  • Ask for support where you feel stuck or want to level up

Download the Business & Brand Building Blueprint

Includes Google Sheet, Notion Doc, PDF and BluePrint BOT.

NEW – ChatGPT ‘Blueprint Bot’ for Brand Builders

Meet your new growth sidekick, the ChatGPT Bot for Brand Builders.

What does it do?

It guides you through the Business & Brand Building Blueprint and helps you:

  • Self-assess your current level
  • Identify your progress
  • Get clear on what to do next
  • Find the right tools and BBA resources

Whether you’re refining your offer or scaling up, the bot helps you move forward with focus and structure.

Access the Blueprint Bot

Watch the bot in action!

Jacob Cass is a brand designer & strategist, educator, podcaster, business coach and the founder of JUST Creative, an award-winning branding & design consultancy that doubles as an industry-leading blog. Get in touch.
